testcase.classname: Adding Food Items to the Cart by Searching Restaurant and Food Item Under it
testcase.name: Check whether user is able to search restaurant, food item under it and add it to the cart
testcase.failure:
Given Swiggy Application is Up and Running..................................passed When User enters and select the desired location from "placeOrderBySearchingRestaurant" and 0.passed Then User should be navigated to restaurants page with the url "https://www.swiggy.com/restaurants".passed When User clicks Search Link................................................passed Then System should show Search For Restaurants or Dishes Search Box.........passed When User enters the restaurant name based on value of "placeOrderBySearchingRestaurant" and 0.passed Then System should show the list of restaurant similar to the entered value.passed When User chooses the desired restaurant based on value of "placeOrderBySearchingRestaurant" and 0 and go to the specific restaurant page.passed When User adding the actual food items to the cart based on value of "placeOrderBySearchingRestaurant" and 0.passed Then Checkout Button should be visible to the user..........................failed
StackTrace: java.lang.AssertionError: expected [true] but found [false] at org.testng.Assert.fail(Assert.java:99) at org.testng.Assert.failNotEquals(Assert.java:1037) at org.testng.Assert.assertTrue(Assert.java:45) at org.testng.Assert.assertTrue(Assert.java:55) at com.swiggy.steps.PlaceOrderBySearchingRestaurant.checkoutButtonShouldBeVisibleToTheUser(PlaceOrderBySearchingRestaurant.java:87) at ✽.Checkout Button should be visible to the user(file:///D:/lms-workspace/SwiggyCucumber/src/test/resources/features/placeOrderBySearchingRestaurant.feature:13)
